mapper.select: select r.id,r.total_value as totalValue,r.evaluate_text as evaluateText, r.registrationId,r.likes,r.create_time as createTime,u.nickname from rate as r join medical_registration as mr on mr.id=r.registrationId join patient_user_info_card as p on p.id=mr.patient_card_id join patient_user as u on u.id=p.user_id where p.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update rate set likes = likes+1 where id=#{rateId}
mapper.select: select evaluate_text as evaluateText,score1,score2,score3,score4,score5, score6,score7,score8,score9,score10,create_time as createTime from rate where id=#{rateId}
